snippet.title: We Were Here - Too | Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
We Were Here Too, the sequel to the co-op puzzle game 'We Were Here', is a brain-breaking new adventure in the forgotten halls of Castle Rock, Antarctica, which will officially release on 02-02-2018.

Pre-order now!  http://totalmayhemgames.com/preorder/

Official Website: http://www.totalmayhemgames.com/
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/WeWereHereGame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wewereheregame
Instagram: TotalMayhemGames
Steam Group: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/WWHO
